Dul√© Hill (The Wonder Years) joins the show to talk about stepping into the iconic role of the father on The Wonder Years reboot, why representation in TV is so important, how he got into tap dancing and he demonstrates a perfect Jamaican accent. Plus, he's a good sport about all of Justin's "Dul√© Hill" puns.
